item.title: 联邦卫生官员说，美国一些折扣零售商出售的肉桂粉受到高浓度铅的污染，应予以丢弃。

item.description:

item.title: 1965年，民权示威者在阿拉巴马州塞尔玛的埃德蒙-佩特斯桥（Edmund Pettus Bridge）举行游行，遭到州警和治安官的暴力驱散，这就是著名的 "血色星期天"。
item.description:
ON THIS DAY: In 1965, a march by civil rights demonstrators was violently broken up at the Edmund Pettus Bridge in Selma, Alabama, by state troopers and a sheriff’s posse in what became known as “Bloody Sunday.” https://t.co/1KhXnvgydX pic.twitter.com/C0pxhXq6EE

— ABC News (@ABC) March 7, 2024

item.title: 国情咨文是宪法规定的总统传统，不应该是竞选演说，现在 2024 年大选正如火如荼地进行，这是拜登为自己连任辩护的重要机会：
item.description:
The State of the Union address is a constitutionally-mandated tradition of the presidency, and not supposed to be a campaign speech, with the 2024 election now in full swing, it's a key opportunity for Biden to make his case for a second term: https://t.co/8acZK7Meot

item.title: 春天向前走 "这句话早在幼儿园就已经教过了，但这个概念仍然让许多成年人感到困惑。但为什么我们要在每年春天把时钟拨快？
item.description:
'Spring forward' is a phrase taught as early as kindergarten, but a concept that still stumps many adults.

— ABC News (@ABC) March 7, 2024

item.title: 根据新的研究，美国一些沿海城市正在 "消失 "在地面上，这可能会在不久的将来进一步加剧海平面上升的复杂性。
